poem:
Title: In the Theater of Public Trial

In the hushed words
of one-gloved testimony,
a Stormy tale unfolds.
Red lips reveal secret sums,
a dance with shadows of power.

The trial, beating like a drum,
resumes in the morning light.
From the mouth of a Daniels,
emerges the truth miners' delight.

A fixer, a fee - cast adrift
in the city's ceaseless bite.
